ValidationRule.description: If a rep trys to sell PGi UC products on a deal that is not UpSell and was created after 1/20/20 then they will be blocked, they must sell TPx UC products.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Product_MRR_Total_Legacy_UC__c >= 1.00, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE (2020,01,20), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Deal_Type__c,"Up-Sell (Rev Increase)")), RecordType.Name = "PGi Opportunity" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PGi's UCaaS Products are not allowed to be sold anymore for new business deals, please select a TPx UCaaS Product offering before changing the Deal Type.
